name: Jokes Ext.
description: The Funny Extension is your ticket to a browser experience filled with laughter and lightheartedness! Designed to inject humor into your daily browsing routine, this Chrome extension delivers a delightful selection of random jokes with just a click of a button. Powered by the "icanhazdadjoke" API, it ensures a steady stream of witty one-liners, puns, and dad jokes to brighten up your day. Whether you're taking a break from work, relaxing at home, or simply in need of a giggle, the Funny Extension is your go-to companion.
